PlaceholderDesc_Dialog_HasDialog_Start: Start of the content that will only be rendered if the npc has a dialog. Must be closed with Dialog_HasDialog_End.
PlaceholderDesc_Dialog_HasDialog_End: End of the content that will only be rendered if the current npc has a dialog.
PlaceholderDesc_Dialog_Start: First dialog step and all next dialog steps that run in the same function.
PlaceholderDesc_Dialog_Additional_Functi: Will be replaced with additional dialog functions or removed if no additional function is required.
